publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4499 Brian Adam: Evening Express - Vandalism Everyone Pays Campaign—That the Parliament notes that last year there were 5,290 acts of vandalism reported in Aberdeen; further notes that such vandalism cost Aberdeen City Council £1.5 million; commends the Evening Express for mounting its Vandalism - Everyone Pays campaign, and hopes that Aberdonians will co-operate with Grampian Police to try to stem this problem.
S2M-4499 Evening Express, Vandalism - Everyone Pays Campaign (lodged on 5 June 2006) Michael Matheson*
S2M-4499 Evening Express, Vandalism - Everyone Pays Campaign (lodged on 5 June 2006) Fergus Ewing*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr David Davidson*, Richard Lochhead*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-4499 Evening Express, Vandalism - Everyone Pays Campaign (lodged on 5 June 2006) Ms Maureen Watt*

S2M-4499 Brian Adam: Evening Express, Vandalism - Everyone Pays Campaign—That the Parliament notes that last year there were 5,290 acts of vandalism reported in Aberdeen; further notes that such vandalism cost Aberdeen City Council £1.5 million; commends the Evening Express for mounting its Vandalism - Everyone Pays campaign, and hopes that Aberdonians will co-operate with Grampian Police to try to stem this problem. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Fergus Ewing, Mrs Nanette Milne, Mr David Davidson, Richard Lochhead, Shiona Baird, Ms Maureen Watt
S2M-4499 Evening Express, Vandalism - Everyone Pays Campaign (lodged on 5 June 2006) Stewart Stevenson*
S2M-4499 Evening Express, Vandalism - Everyone Pays Campaign (lodged on 5 June 2006) Mr Jamie Stone*
